name: customer_id
description: Identifier for the customer who owns the account

name: account_type
description: Type of the account (e.g., Basic Credit Card)

name: open_date_id
description: Foreign key referencing the date the account was opened

name: close_date_id
description: Foreign key referencing the date the account was closed (NULL if still open)

name: account_status
description: Current status of the account (e.g., Suspended)
